item.title: BO - Modules : ps_imageslider - Configure
item.description: BO - Modules : ps_imageslider - Configure Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO> Modules> Module Manager> ps_imageslider ps_imageslider is displayed Click on configure button the configure image slider page is well displayed Go to Settings -> update Pause on hover to NO and save The settings have been successfully updated. message is displayed Go to Settings -> update Pause on hover to Yes
